original_title: 戦慄怪奇ファイル コワすぎ！史上最恐の劇場版
overview: In this sixth instalment, director Kudo enlists the help of powerful psychic Dogen , physicist Masahiko Saito, and idol Akari, to make a big movie while investigating the abandoned "Tatari Village", where anyone who enters goes insane or dies.
title: Senritsu Kaiki File Kowasugi! The Most Terrifying Movie in History
